original_text: And to rule over the day and over the night, and to divide the light from the darkness: and God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 낮과 밤을 주관하게 하시고 빛과 어둠을 나뉘게 하시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: And to rule over the day
and to divide the light from the darkness
and God saw that it was good
